title.rendered: Casa Munras Garden Hotel & Spa Celebrates 200 Years of Hospitality

content.rendered:
—Special $200 Anniversary Package—

MONTEREY, Calif., July 31, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — In celebration of its historic birthday, Casa Munras Garden Hotel & Spa announces a special 200th Anniversary Package for $200.00. The package includes one-night accommodations for two, a welcome bottle of Cava champagne for a toast, and a complimentary Grab & Go breakfast for two. Based on space, this offer is available from Sunday through Thursday, on select dates for the month of September 2024.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/casa-munras-garden-hotel–spa-celebrates-200-years-of-hospitality-302211450.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
